text: Valindilayi manji gatimbuganayi, muni luvi lukumbi, mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga ihelela na kuyingila mulitanda na kugatimbugana manji. Mundu mweatumbwili kuyingila mumanji pegamali kutimbugana, ndi alamili utamu wowoha wula weavi nawu5:4 Musitali wenuwu wipatika lepi mu mayandiku gangi ga kadeni.
